titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that a postage stamp should be issued to honor law enforcement officers killed in the line of duty.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 6/23/2004--Introduced. Calls on the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee to recommend to the Postmaster General that a commemorative stamp should be issued by the United States Postal Service honoring law enforcement officers killed in the line of duty.
